thread.title: Lanea Langston
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Lanea Langston

author: Lanea Langston
title: Lanea Langston
text: My husband and I went to purchase a bedroom set and our salesmen Davonte (Southfield, MI location) was very professional, easygoing and helpful. We received our bedroom set the next day and is currently lying in it!! Thanks so much!!!
